mn60:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava kosalesu carikam caramano mahata bhikkhusanghena saddhim yena sala nama kosalanam brahmanagamo tadavasari.
mn60:2.2: “samano khalu bho gotamo sakyaputto sakyakula pabbajito kosalesu carikam caramano mahata bhikkhusanghena saddhim salam anuppatto.
mn60:2.3: Tam kho pana bhavantam gotamam evam kalyano kittisaddo abbhuggato:
mn60:2.4: ‘itipi so bhagava araham sammasambuddho vijjacaranasampanno sugato lokavidu anuttaro purisadammasarathi sattha devamanussanam buddho bhagava’ti.
mn60:2.5: So imam lokam sadevakam samarakam sabrahmakam sassamanabrahmanim pajam sadevamanussam sayam abhinna sacchikatva pavedeti.
mn60:2.6: So dhammam deseti adikalyanam majjhekalyanam pariyosanakalyanam sattham sabyanjanam, kevalaparipunnam parisuddham brahmacariyam pakaseti.
mn60:2.7: Sadhu kho pana tatharupanam arahatam dassanam hoti”ti.
mn60:3.1: Atha kho saleyyaka brahmanagahapatika yena bhagava tenupasankamimsu; upasankamitva appekacce bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidimsu. Appekacce bhagavata saddhim sammodimsu; sammodaniyam katham saraniyam vitisaretva ekamantam nisidimsu. Appekacce yena bhagava tenanjalim panametva ekamantam nisidimsu. Appekacce bhagavato santike namagottam savetva ekamantam nisidimsu. Appekacce tunhibhuta ekamantam nisidimsu. Ekamantam nisinne kho saleyyake brahmanagahapatike bhagava etadavoca:
mn60:4.1: “atthi pana vo, gahapatayo, koci manapo sattha yasmim vo akaravati saddha patiladdha”ti?
mn60:4.2: “Natthi kho no, bhante, koci manapo sattha yasmim no akaravati saddha patiladdha”ti.
mn60:4.3: “Manapam vo, gahapatayo, sattharam alabhantehi ayam apannako dhammo samadaya vattitabbo.
mn60:4.4: Apannako hi, gahapatayo, dhammo samatto samadinno, so vo bhavissati digharattam hitaya sukhaya.
mn60:5.1: Santi, gahapatayo, eke samanabrahmana evamvadino evamditthino:
mn60:5.2: ‘natthi dinnam, natthi yittham, natthi hutam; natthi sukatadukkatanam kammanam phalam vipako, natthi ayam loko, natthi paro loko; natthi mata, natthi pita; natthi satta opapatika; natthi loke samanabrahmana sammaggata samma patipanna ye imanca lokam paranca lokam sayam abhinna sacchikatva pavedenti’ti.
mn60:6.1: Tesamyeva kho, gahapatayo, samanabrahmananam eke samanabrahmana ujuvipaccanikavada.
mn60:6.3: ‘atthi dinnam, atthi yittham, atthi hutam; atthi sukatadukkatanam kammanam phalam vipako; atthi ayam loko, atthi paro loko; atthi mata, atthi pita; atthi satta opapatika; atthi loke samanabrahmana sammaggata samma patipanna ye imanca lokam paranca lokam sayam abhinna sacchikatva pavedenti’ti.
mn60:7.1: “Tatra, gahapatayo, ye te samanabrahmana evamvadino evamditthino:
mn60:7.2: ‘natthi dinnam, natthi yittham …pe… ye imanca lokam paranca lokam sayam abhinna sacchikatva pavedenti’ti
mn60:7.3: tesametam patikankham—yamidam kayasucaritam, vacisucaritam, manosucaritam—ime tayo kusale dhamme abhinivajjetva yamidam kayaduccaritam, vaciduccaritam, manoduccaritam—ime tayo akusale dhamme samadaya vattissanti.
mn60:7.5: Na hi te bhonto samanabrahmana passanti akusalanam dhammanam adinavam okaram sankilesam, kusalanam dhammanam nekkhamme anisamsam vodanapakkham.
mn60:8.1: Santamyeva pana param lokam ‘natthi paro loko’ tissa ditthi hoti; sassa hoti micchaditthi.
mn60:8.2: Santamyeva kho pana param lokam ‘natthi paro loko’ti sankappeti; svassa hoti micchasankappo.
mn60:8.3: Santamyeva kho pana param lokam ‘natthi paro loko’ti vacam bhasati; sassa hoti micchavaca.
mn60:8.4: Santamyeva kho pana param lokam ‘natthi paro loko’ti aha; ye te arahanto paralokaviduno tesamayam paccanikam karoti.
mn60:8.5: Santamyeva kho pana param lokam ‘natthi paro loko’ti param sannapeti; sassa hoti asaddhammasannatti.
mn60:8.6: Taya ca pana asaddhammasannattiya attanukkamseti, param vambheti.
mn60:8.7: Iti pubbeva kho panassa susilyam pahinam hoti, dussilyam paccupatthitam—
mn60:8.8: ayanca micchaditthi micchasankappo micchavaca ariyanam paccanikata asaddhammasannatti attukkamsana paravambhana. Evamassime aneke papaka akusala dhamma sambhavanti micchaditthipaccaya.
mn60:9.1: Tatra, gahapatayo, vinnu puriso iti patisancikkhati:
mn60:9.2: ‘sace kho natthi paro loko evamayam bhavam purisapuggalo kayassa bheda sotthimattanam karissati;
mn60:9.3: sace kho atthi paro loko, evamayam bhavam purisapuggalo kayassa bheda param marana apayam duggatim vinipatam nirayam upapajjissati.
mn60:9.4: Kamam kho pana mahu paro loko, hotu nesam bhavatam samanabrahmananam saccam vacanam;
mn60:9.5: atha ca panayam bhavam purisapuggalo dittheva dhamme vinnunam garayho—dussilo purisapuggalo micchaditthi natthikavado’ti.
mn60:9.6: Sace kho attheva paro loko, evam imassa bhoto purisapuggalassa ubhayattha kaliggaho—
mn60:9.7: yanca dittheva dhamme vinnunam garayho, yanca kayassa bheda param marana apayam duggatim vinipatam nirayam upapajjissati.
mn60:9.8: Evamassayam apannako dhammo dussamatto samadinno, ekamsam pharitva titthati, rincati kusalam thanam.

mn60:13.1: Santi, gahapatayo, eke samanabrahmana evamvadino evamditthino:

mn60:27.3: Santamyeva kho pana hetum ‘atthi hetu’ti vacam bhasati; sassa hoti sammavaca.
mn60:27.4: Santamyeva kho pana hetum ‘atthi hetu’ti aha, ye te arahanto hetuvada tesamayam na paccanikam karoti.
mn60:27.5: Santamyeva kho pana hetum ‘atthi hetu’ti param sannapeti; sassa hoti saddhammasannatti.
mn60:27.6: Taya ca pana saddhammasannattiya nevattanukkamseti, na param vambheti.
mn60:27.7: Iti pubbeva kho panassa dussilyam pahinam hoti, susilyam paccupatthitam—
mn60:27.8: ayanca sammaditthi sammasankappo sammavaca ariyanam apaccanikata saddhammasannatti anattukkamsana aparavambhana. Evamassime aneke kusala dhamma sambhavanti sammaditthipaccaya.
mn60:28.1: Tatra, gahapatayo, vinnu puriso iti patisancikkhati: ‘sace kho atthi hetu, evamayam bhavam purisapuggalo kayassa bheda param marana sugatim saggam lokam upapajjissati.
mn60:28.2: Kamam kho pana mahu hetu, hotu nesam bhavatam samanabrahmananam saccam vacanam;
mn60:28.3: atha ca panayam bhavam purisapuggalo dittheva dhamme vinnunam pasamso—silava purisapuggalo sammaditthi hetuvado’ti.
mn60:28.4: Sace kho atthi hetu, evam imassa bhoto purisapuggalassa ubhayattha kataggaho—
mn60:28.5: yanca dittheva dhamme vinnunam pasamso, yanca kayassa bheda param marana sugatim saggam lokam upapajjissati.
mn60:28.6: Evamassayam apannako dhammo susamatto samadinno, ubhayamsam pharitva titthati, rincati akusalam thanam.
mn60:29.1: Santi, gahapatayo, eke samanabrahmana evamvadino evamditthino:
mn60:30.1: Tesamyeva kho, gahapatayo, samanabrahmananam eke samanabrahmana ujuvipaccanikavada.
mn60:31.2: ye kho te bhonto samanabrahmana evamvadino evamditthino:
mn60:31.4: yepi te bhonto samanabrahmana evamvadino evamditthino:
mn60:31.6: Ahanceva kho pana ajananto apassanto ekamsena adaya vohareyyam—
mn60:31.7: idameva saccam, moghamannanti, na metam assa patirupam.
mn60:31.8: Ye kho te bhonto samanabrahmana evamvadino evamditthino:
mn60:31.9: ‘natthi sabbaso aruppa’ti, sace tesam bhavatam samanabrahmananam saccam vacanam, thanametam vijjati—
mn60:31.10: ye te deva rupino manomaya, apannakam me tatrupapatti bhavissati.
mn60:31.11: Ye pana te bhonto samanabrahmana evamvadino evamditthino:
mn60:31.12: ‘atthi sabbaso aruppa’ti, sace tesam bhavatam samanabrahmananam saccam vacanam, thanametam vijjati—
mn60:31.13: ye te deva arupino sannamaya, apannakam me tatrupapatti bhavissati.
mn60:31.16: So iti patisankhaya rupanamyeva nibbidaya viragaya nirodhaya patipanno hoti.
mn60:32.1: Santi, gahapatayo, eke samanabrahmana evamvadino evamditthino:
mn60:33.1: Tesamyeva kho, gahapatayo, samanabrahmananam eke samanabrahmana ujuvipaccanikavada.
mn60:34.2: ye kho te bhonto samanabrahmana evamvadino evamditthino:
mn60:34.4: yepi te bhonto samanabrahmana evamvadino evamditthino:
mn60:34.6: Ahanceva kho pana ajananto apassanto ekamsena adaya vohareyyam—
mn60:34.7: idameva saccam, moghamannanti, na metam assa patirupam.
mn60:34.8: Ye kho te bhonto samanabrahmana evamvadino evamditthino:
mn60:34.9: ‘natthi sabbaso bhavanirodho’ti, sace tesam bhavatam samanabrahmananam saccam vacanam, thanametam vijjati—
mn60:34.10: ye te deva arupino sannamaya apannakam me tatrupapatti bhavissati.
mn60:34.11: Ye pana te bhonto samanabrahmana evamvadino evamditthino:
mn60:34.12: ‘atthi sabbaso bhavanirodho’ti, sace tesam bhavatam samanabrahmananam saccam vacanam, thanametam vijjati—
mn60:34.14: Ye kho te bhonto samanabrahmana evamvadino evamditthino:
mn60:34.15: ‘natthi sabbaso bhavanirodho’ti, tesamayam ditthi saragaya santike, samyogaya santike, abhinandanaya santike, ajjhosanaya santike, upadanaya santike.
mn60:34.16: Ye pana te bhonto samanabrahmana evamvadino evamditthino:
mn60:34.17: ‘atthi sabbaso bhavanirodho’ti, tesamayam ditthi asaragaya santike, asamyogaya santike, anabhinandanaya santike, anajjhosanaya santike, anupadanaya santiketi.
mn60:34.18: So iti patisankhaya bhavanamyeva nibbidaya viragaya nirodhaya patipanno hoti.
mn60:35.1: Cattarome, gahapatayo, puggala santo samvijjamana lokasmim.
mn60:35.3: Idha, gahapatayo, ekacco puggalo attantapo hoti attaparitapananuyogamanuyutto.
mn60:35.4: Idha, gahapatayo, ekacco puggalo parantapo hoti paraparitapananuyogamanuyutto.
mn60:35.5: Idha, gahapatayo, ekacco puggalo attantapo ca hoti attaparitapananuyogamanuyutto parantapo ca paraparitapananuyogamanuyutto.
mn60:35.6: Idha, gahapatayo, ekacco puggalo nevattantapo hoti nattaparitapananuyogamanuyutto na parantapo na paraparitapananuyogamanuyutto;
mn60:35.7: so anattantapo aparantapo dittheva dhamme nicchato nibbuto sitibhuto sukhappatisamvedi brahmabhutena attana viharati.
mn60:36.1: Katamo ca, gahapatayo, puggalo attantapo attaparitapananuyogamanuyutto?
mn60:36.2: Idha, gahapatayo, ekacco puggalo acelako hoti muttacaro hatthapalekhano …pe…
mn60:36.3: iti evarupam anekavihitam kayassa atapanaparitapananuyogamanuyutto viharati.
mn60:36.4: Ayam vuccati, gahapatayo, puggalo attantapo attaparitapananuyogamanuyutto.
mn60:37.1: Katamo ca, gahapatayo, puggalo parantapo paraparitapananuyogamanuyutto?
mn60:37.2: Idha, gahapatayo, ekacco puggalo orabbhiko hoti sukariko …pe… ye va panannepi keci kururakammanta.
mn60:37.3: Ayam vuccati, gahapatayo, puggalo parantapo paraparitapananuyogamanuyutto.
mn60:38.1: Katamo ca, gahapatayo, puggalo attantapo ca attaparitapananuyogamanuyutto parantapo ca paraparitapananuyogamanuyutto?
mn60:38.2: Idha, gahapatayo, ekacco puggalo raja va hoti khattiyo muddhavasitto …pe…
mn60:38.3: tepi dandatajjita bhayatajjita assumukha rudamana parikammani karonti.
mn60:38.4: Ayam vuccati, gahapatayo, puggalo attantapo ca attaparitapananuyogamanuyutto parantapo ca paraparitapananuyogamanuyutto.
mn60:39.1: Katamo ca, gahapatayo, puggalo nevattantapo nattaparitapananuyogamanuyutto na parantapo na paraparitapananuyogamanuyutto;
mn60:39.2: so anattantapo aparantapo dittheva dhamme nicchato nibbuto sitibhuto sukhappatisamvedi brahmabhutena attana viharati?
mn60:40-54.1: Idha, gahapatayo, tathagato loke uppajjati araham sammasambuddho …
mn60:40-54.3: so ime panca nivarane pahaya cetaso upakkilese pannaya dubbalikarane
mn60:40-54.4: vivicceva kamehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakkam savicaram vivekajam pitisukham pathamam jhanam upasampajja viharati.
mn60:40-54.5: Vitakkavicaranam vupasama ajjhattam sampasadanam cetaso ekodibhavam avitakkam avicaram samadhijam pitisukham dutiyam jhanam …pe…
mn60:55.1: So evam samahite citte parisuddhe pariyodate anangane vigatupakkilese mudubhute kammaniye thite anenjappatte pubbenivasanussatinanaya cittam abhininnameti.
mn60:55.2: So anekavihitam pubbenivasam anussarati seyyathidam—ekampi jatim dvepi jatiyo …pe… iti sakaram sauddesam anekavihitam pubbenivasam anussarati.
mn60:55.3: So evam samahite citte parisuddhe pariyodate anangane vigatupakkilese mudubhute kammaniye thite anenjappatte sattanam cutupapatananaya cittam abhininnameti.
mn60:55.4: So dibbena cakkhuna visuddhena atikkantamanusakena satte passati cavamane upapajjamane hine panite suvanne dubbanne, sugate duggate …pe… yathakammupage satte pajanati.
mn60:55.5: So evam samahite citte parisuddhe pariyodate anangane vigatupakkilese mudubhute kammaniye thite anenjappatte asavanam khayananaya cittam abhininnameti.
mn60:55.8: Tassa evam janato evam passato kamasavapi cittam vimuccati, bhavasavapi cittam vimuccati, avijjasavapi cittam vimuccati.
mn60:55.10: ‘Khina jati, vusitam brahmacariyam, katam karaniyam, naparam itthattaya’ti pajanati.
mn60:56.1: Ayam vuccati, gahapatayo, puggalo nevattantapo nattaparitapananuyogamanuyutto na parantapo na paraparitapananuyogamanuyutto;
mn60:56.2: so anattantapo aparantapo dittheva dhamme nicchato nibbuto sitibhuto sukhappatisamvedi brahmabhutena attana viharati”ti.
mn60:57.1: Evam vutte, saleyyaka brahmanagahapatika bhagavantam etadavocum:
mn60:57.3: Seyyathapi, bho gotama, nikkujjitam va ukkujjeyya, paticchannam va vivareyya, mulhassa va maggam acikkheyya, andhakare va telapajjotam dhareyya ‘cakkhumanto rupani dakkhanti’ti; evamevam bhota gotamena anekapariyayena dhammo pakasito.
mn60:57.4: Ete mayam bhavantam gotamam saranam gacchama dhammanca bhikkhusanghanca.
mn60:57.5: Upasake no bhavam gotamo dharetu ajjatagge panupetam saranam gate”ti.
